channel.title: Getting my server open to public *yay* how do I do that guys?
channel.description:
I know theres tuts on this but I dont understand them. Put what you tell me in NEWB LANGUAGE please because i've only been doing this for *checks hours* 21 hours. And thats not over a course of a couple days i've kept my computer on all night.
I have my ip. Its pwnpk.no-ip.org. I made it at no-ip.com
The next step is.... what? I dont think I want hamachi. Well honestly I dont know but this is why. I just want the kind of server where they go to moparisthebest.com and click "serverstatus list" (which is http://www.flashspace.us/serverstatus.php website) and can find my server listed. I know that I need to do something with a router. I know I need to do something with a "port forward"
I have a very very very vauge idea of what either of these are please be desriptive thankyou.

item.title: Getting my server open to public *yay* how do I do that guys?
item.dc:creator: @jensie jensie
item.description:
@jensie wrote:

Ok lol: A router is a smart “box” that makes it possible to have wireless internet, so a router is connected to your modem, and it makes a wireless conection to your pc. OK?

Read full topic

item.title: Getting my server open to public *yay* how do I do that guys?
item.dc:creator: @dragster32 dragster32
item.description:
@dragster32 wrote:

[quote=“joshie, post:8, topic:98483”]If you need anymore help don’t hesitate to contact me!

Many thanks,
Josh ^[/quote]

do i need to buy a router at like radioshack? i honestly have no clue to what a router is.

jensie:

Only thing you need to do is port forward.

oh really? explain how then please.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 22, 2007, 11:37:04 AM[/size][hr]Will somebody please post what a router even is?

item.title: Getting my server open to public *yay* how do I do that guys?
item.dc:creator: @joshie joshie
item.description:
@joshie wrote:

Drag, if you have a router under neath there should be a little sticker;

The URL to acess your login;

Your Username; Most lightly admin

Your password; Most lightly password

Once, your in go to portfowarding, the add a portward;

Name: Mopar1
Port: The port your server starts on
Port: The Port your server ends on
IP: Your internal ip (lan) which is on your settings also

If you need anymore help don’t hesitate to contact me!

Many thanks,
Josh ^

Read full topic

item.title: Getting my server open to public *yay* how do I do that guys?
item.dc:creator: @dragster32 dragster32
item.description:
@dragster32 wrote:

I tried all those none worked. Is there honestly no freakin way to get into it? and hey do i have to buy a router or something i read somewhere that you have to. i didnt do nothing. All i did was

make a server
I can access my own server through localhost as my ip
i’ve begun editing my server to my liking
didnt make a router
didnt buy a router
didnt portforward

Read full topic
item.source: Getting my server open to public *yay* how do I do that guys?

item.title: Getting my server open to public *yay* how do I do that guys?
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

In your browser, type in 192.168.1.1 then you should get a user/pass prompt, depending on the router, here’s some variations:
User:NONE
Pass: admin
Pass: password
pass: 1234

User: admin
pass: admin
pass: password
pass: 1234

Once you get in, it should say what model/make your router is.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting my server open to public *yay* how do I do that guys?
item.dc:creator: @dragster32 dragster32
item.description:
@dragster32 wrote:

It didnt work. heres what I did tell me if i did anything wrong.

downloaded no-ip.
put a checkmark next to my name and made the cool dude a happy dude
opened my server folder
compiled- no errors
run- its now running for me
opened the server status page on moparisthebest.com
entered pwnpk.no-ip.org as my servers name.
entered 5555 as port- didnt work
entered 43594 as port- didnt work
what now?

Read full topic
item.source: Getting my server open to public *yay* how do I do that guys?

item.title: Getting my server open to public *yay* how do I do that guys?
item.dc:creator: @javis javis
item.description:
@javis wrote:

ive made a couple guides on this on one of my old sites let me see if I can find them… ah yes here they are.

heres how to set up a no-ip ect.

I decided to make this little guid based off what I had to do to get server up and running. Hope u all enjoy.

K first off go download winrar. I recomend going on google.com and and searching for free winrar lol. NOTE (winrar is what makes it so u can actually download sources exc.)

K second off u need to get a server source. Download and save it to your documents. I recomend Testscape for new coders and PVP scape or Pimpscape for advanced. NOTE; i will not be releasing my source ;p.

Now once uve done all of that u should see a pile off books in your documents that says eather Testscape or w/e source u downloaded. Right click those and then click extract and then ok. No u should have a folder with the same name as the books. Open it and find Client.java. Right click Client.java and click open with and use notepad. Now u may start editing stuff. I recomend asking in tut forum for help with added stuff.

Now Go to no-ip.com and register. Once ur done log on and look at the left of the screen for somthing that says host/redirects and clickHos add. Click it and where it says Hostname and change to what u want ur no-ip to be. then under that u can click the drop down thing and pic if u want no-ip.info, no-ip.org, no-ip.biz, ect. Now dont touch anything else just scroll down to where it says create host and click that. No u have a proper host

K for the part where u make it so every one else can get on. Click downloads at top of screen on no-ip.com and choose what type of software u have(weather it be mac, windows, lunix, ect.) and download it to ur desktop. Open it and do all the stuff it says. Then when u get the pop up with ur server ip in it check the box beside ur servers ip. NOTE (There will only be one thing in there). Once uve click and u should hav server ready to go online.

Now go into ur documents and open ur server again. Now open Runeserver.bat. And there u go just log on now.

:Pics:
Adding host

Naming server ip

Downloading no-ip

completely 100% by my

this is my noob guide for basic stuff

welp here it is the one i promissed it just covers some stuff that the guy was having problems with and i made in like 10 min so its pretty bad but o’well notice some of stuff will be out of date…

some very helpfull places to help build/modify ur server are: moparscape.no-ip.org, x-cel-psc.com~very good site~ and dodian.com

first off id like to start with making admins and mods.
first go into the client.java folder (extract it with notepad) and search for Start of mod
you should see this
//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

/checkmods();
checkadmins();
checkstaff();
if(checkmods() == 5)
playerRights = 1;
if(checkadmins() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Javis”))
playerRights = 2;
if(checkstaff() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Santa”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Jas0n”))
playerRights = 3;/

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Santa”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

change the santa to your user name. Also change the Jas0n to who ever is co owner.

now go into you character folder and find your name/file. Open it and look for the part where it says character rights. for owner change to 3, for admin change to a 2, for mod change to 1, and for reg person it should be a 0. I already made u owner so dont worry bought your account.

Now to get ur server online go to no-ip.com and register. log onto your name and click on add at the left side of the screen. Once u get for the host name add your server name + you can use the drop down arrow to change it from no-ip.biz to stuff like no-ip.info no-ip.org exc. k now leavce everything else the same and scroll down tell u find create host and revert buttons beside ea other. click create host.it will make you server now at the top of the no-ip page click on the tab that says downloads and find what type of computer u hav (mac,windows, exc) and download it to ur computer.

LAUNCHING AND COMPILING IMPORTANT
k to launch you server first open the no-ip window that should be already downloaded on your computer (more than likely in documents foldier) and check the box beside the name of ur server so the smilie goes from a cool dude to a happy face. no go into your server foldier ( this one that u downloaded and open the runserver thing. now all u have to do is log on and go put ur server on places like codefasga.

LOL HOPE U ENJOID THE GUIDE

Read full topic
